<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="November_26th_.28Thanksgiving_.28United_States.29.29">November 26th (<a href="/wiki/Thanksgiving_(United_States)" title="Thanksgiving (United States)">Thanksgiving (United States)</a>)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:Did_you_know&amp;action=edit&amp;section=60" title="Edit section: November 26th (Thanksgiving (United States))">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Jauchzet_Gott_in_allen_Landen.2C_BWV_51">Jauchzet Gott in allen Landen, BWV 51</span></h4>
<div class="plainlinks hlist">
<ul>
<li>( <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template%3ADid_you_know_nominations%2FJauchzet_Gott_in_allen_Landen%2C_BWV_51&amp;action=edit">Review or comment</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Jauchzet_Gott_in_allen_Landen%2C_BWV_51&amp;action=history">Article history</a> )</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div style="float:right; margin-left:0.5em;" id="mp-dyk-img">
<div class="thumbinner mp-thumb" style="background: transparent; border: none; padding: 0; max-width: 120px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Gottfried_reiche.jpg" class="image" title="Gottfried Reiche"><img alt="Gottfried Reiche" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/bf/Gottfried_reiche.jpg/120px-Gottfried_reiche.jpg" width="120" height="144" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/bf/Gottfried_reiche.jpg/180px-Gottfried_reiche.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/bf/Gottfried_reiche.jpg/240px-Gottfried_reiche.jpg 2x" data-file-width="458" data-file-height="550" /></a>
<div class="thumbcaption" style="padding: 0.25em 0; word-wrap: break-word;">Gottfried Reiche</div>
</div>
</div>
<ul>
<li>... that <a href="/wiki/Johann_Sebastian_Bach" title="Johann Sebastian Bach">Bach</a> had virtuoso solists in mind to perform <b><a href="/wiki/Jauchzet_Gott_in_allen_Landen,_BWV_51" title="Jauchzet Gott in allen Landen, BWV 51"><i>Jauchzet Gott in allen Landen</i>, BWV 51</a></b>, possibly a female singer and the trumpeter <a href="/wiki/Gottfried_Reiche" title="Gottfried Reiche">Gottfried Reiche</a> <i>(pictured)</i>?</li>
</ul>
<dl>
<dd>
<ul>
<li><i>Reviewed</i>: <a href="/wiki/Template:Did_you_know_nominations/Violated_Paradise" title="Template:Did you know nominations/Violated Paradise">Violated Paradise</a></li>
<li><i>Comment</i>: suitable for a joyful occasion such as a Thanksgiving day</li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<p><small>Improved to Good Article status by <a href="/wiki/User:Gerda_Arendt" title="User:Gerda Arendt">Gerda Arendt</a> (<a href="/wiki/User_talk:Gerda_Arendt" title="User talk:Gerda Arendt">talk</a>). Self-nominated at 12:22, 6 October 2015 (UTC).</small></p>
<dl>
<dd>
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/File:Symbol_confirmed.svg" class="image"><img alt="Symbol confirmed.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/Symbol_confirmed.svg/16px-Symbol_confirmed.svg.png" width="16" height="16" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/Symbol_confirmed.svg/24px-Symbol_confirmed.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/Symbol_confirmed.svg/32px-Symbol_confirmed.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="180" data-file-height="185" /></a> This all seems ok, re wording, length and sources. Certainly comprehensiveness enough <a href="/wiki/User:Ceoil" title="User:Ceoil">Ceoil</a> (<a href="/wiki/User_talk:Ceoil" title="User talk:Ceoil">talk</a>) 03:47, 10 October 2015 (UTC)</li>
<li>ALT ... that <a href="/wiki/Johann_Sebastian_Bach" title="Johann Sebastian Bach">Bach</a> intended that virtuoso soloists perform <b><a href="/wiki/Jauchzet_Gott_in_allen_Landen,_BWV_51" title="Jauchzet Gott in allen Landen, BWV 51"><i>Jauchzet Gott in allen Landen</i>, BWV 51</a></b>, possibly a female singer and the trumpeter <a href="/wiki/Gottfried_Reiche" title="Gottfried Reiche">Gottfried Reiche</a> <i>(pictured)</i>? <a href="/wiki/User:Ceoil" title="User:Ceoil">Ceoil</a> (<a href="/wiki/User_talk:Ceoil" title="User talk:Ceoil">talk</a>) 03:47, 10 October 2015 (UTC)</li>
</ul>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="A_Very_Gaga_Thanksgiving">A Very Gaga Thanksgiving</span></h4>
<div class="plainlinks hlist">
<ul>
<li>( <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template%3ADid_you_know_nominations%2FA_Very_Gaga_Thanksgiving&amp;action=edit">Review or comment</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=A_Very_Gaga_Thanksgiving&amp;action=history">Article history</a> )</li>
</ul>
</div>
<ul>
<li>... that Ken Tucker of <i><a href="/wiki/Entertainment_Weekly" title="Entertainment Weekly">Entertainment Weekly</a></i> opined that <i><b><a href="/wiki/A_Very_Gaga_Thanksgiving" title="A Very Gaga Thanksgiving">A Very Gaga Thanksgiving</a></b></i> was "disarmingly direct, sincere, and unpretentious"?</li>
</ul>
<dl>
<dd>
<ul>
<li><b>ALT1</b>:... that <i><b><a href="/wiki/A_Very_Gaga_Thanksgiving" title="A Very Gaga Thanksgiving">A Very Gaga Thanksgiving</a></b></i> was conceived and directed by <a href="/wiki/Lady_Gaga" title="Lady Gaga">Lady Gaga</a> herself?</li>
<li><i>Reviewed</i>: <a href="/wiki/Template:Did_you_know_nominations/Vavro_%C5%A0rob%C3%A1r" title="Template:Did you know nominations/Vavro Šrobár">Vavro Šrobár</a></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
